Configured basic test project based on Framework Reference Getting Started guide using the NVelocity view engine but NVelocity can't find the home/index.vm: ------------------------------ NVelocity.Exception.ResourceNotFoundException: Unable to find resource 'home/index.vm' in <0x003bc> NVelocity.Runtime.Resource.ResourceManagerImpl:loadResource (System.String resourceName, Int32 resourceType, System.String encoding) in <0x0022c> NVelocity.Runtime.Resource.ResourceManagerImpl:getResource (System.String resourceName, Int32 resourceType, System.String encoding) ------------------------------
Even though the file exists and the log file indicates that the correct view path has been set: ------------------------------ 2005-07-07 10:23:57,818 - FileResourceLoader : initialization starting. 2005-07-07 10:23:57,818 - FileResourceLoader : adding path '/Users/myhome/Documents/Projects/monorail/views' 2005-07-07 10:23:57,818 - FileResourceLoader : initialization complete. ------------------------------
Attempting to use the Composite view engine throws a different, but related exception: ------------------------------ System.IO.FileNotFoundException: File not found. : /Users/myhome/Documents/Projects/monorail/\Users\myhome\Documents\Projects\monorail\views\home\index.aspx ------------------------------
This seems most probably a result of expecting win32 paths.
